ExampleWords.AUni: false name, pseudonym, pen name, stage name, alias, a.k.a. (also known as), under the name of, under an assumed name, go by the name of,

Question.AUni: (4) What words are used to refer to someone when you can't remember what they are called?

ExampleWords.AUni: what's his/her name, whatchamacallit, whatsit, so and so,

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe someone whose name is not known?

ExampleWords.AUni: anonymous, unnamed, unidentified, incognito, unknown, nameless,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to discovering or stating the name of someone whose name has not been known?

ExampleWords.AUni: name, identify,

Question.AUni: (7) What words are used to indicate a person's name?

ExampleWords.AUni: someone's name is, be called, be known as, named,

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to giving someone a name?

ExampleWords.AUni: name (v), call, be christened, give a name to, choose a name, pick a name, call him/her 'name'

Question.AUni: (9) What words refer to the reason why someone is given a name?
提到一个人为什么会有某个名字，你会怎么说？

ExampleWords.AUni: be named for, be named after, namesake
跟爸姓、跟妈姓、随他爸、随他妈

Question.AUni: (10) When is a name given?
你们一般什么时候给孩子起名？

ExampleWords.AUni: naming ceremony, christening
出生前、出生后、满月、100天

Question.AUni: (11) What words refer to writing your name?
提到写下你的名字，你会怎么说？

ExampleWords.AUni: sign (your name), signature
签名、签字、具名、署名

AStr.Run: Use this domain for those names that are given to people, that people use to call to each other and to talk about each other.
把表示名的词放在这个词群里。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the given names used by people in the language group?
人们会给孩子取什么样的名字？

ExampleWords.AUni: John, David, Mary, Elizabeth
波、涛、海、江、云、莲、凤、秀…（中文里几乎所有的字都可用来当名字）

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the families that exist within the language community. If your culture does not use family names, just leave this domain empty.
把表示姓的词放在这个词群里。

Question.AUni: (1) What names are used by all the members of a family?
姓有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Smith, Jones, MacDonald, Johnson

赵、钱、孙、李、周、吴、郑、王、冯、陈、诸、卫、蒋、沈、韩、杨、朱、秦、尤、许、何、吕、施、张、孔、曹、严、华、金、魏、陶、姜、戚、谢、邹、喻、柏、水、窦、章、云、苏、潘、葛、奚、范、彭、郎、鲁、韦、昌、马、苗、凤、花、方、俞、任、袁、柳、酆、鲍、史、唐、费、廉、岑、薛、雷、贺、倪、汤、滕、殷、罗、毕、郝、邬、安、常、乐、于、时、傅、皮、卡、齐、康、伍、余、元、卜、顾、孟、平、黄、和、穆、萧、尹、姚、邵、堪、汪、祁、毛、禹、狄、米、贝、明、臧、计、伏、成、戴、谈、宋、茅、庞、熊、纪、舒、屈、项、祝、董、粱、杜、阮、蓝、闵、席、季、麻、强、贾、路、娄、危、江、童、颜、郭、梅、盛、林、刁、钟、徐、邱、骆、高、夏、蔡、田、樊、胡、凌、霍、虞、万、支、柯、咎、管、卢、莫、经、房、裘、缪、干、解、应、宗、丁、宣、贲、邓、郁、单、杭、洪、包、诸、左、石、崔、吉、钮、龚、程、嵇、邢、滑、裴、陆、荣、翁、荀、羊、於、惠、甄、魏、家、封、芮、羿、储、靳、汲、邴、糜、松、井、段、富、巫、乌、焦、巴、弓、牧、隗、山、谷、车、侯、宓、蓬、全、郗、班、仰、秋、仲、伊、宫、宁、仇、栾、暴、甘、钭、厉、戎、祖、武、符、刘、景、詹、束、龙、叶、幸、司、韶、郜、黎、蓟、薄、印、宿、白、怀、蒲、台、从、鄂、索、咸、籍、赖、卓、蔺、屠、蒙、池、乔、阴、郁、胥、能、苍、双、闻、莘、党、翟、谭、贡、劳、逄、姬、申、扶、堵、冉、宰、郦、雍、卻、璩、桑、桂、濮、牛、寿、通、边、扈、燕、冀、郏、浦、尚、农、温、别、庄、晏、柴、翟、阎、充、慕、连、茹、习、宦、艾、鱼、容、向、古、易、慎、戈、廖、庚、终、暨、居、衡、步、都、耿、满、弘、匡、国、文、寇、广、禄、阙、东、殴、殳、沃、利、蔚、越、夔、隆、师、巩、厍、聂、晁、勾、敖、融、冷、訾、辛、阚、那、简、饶、空、毋、沙、乜、养、鞠、须、丰、巢、关、蒯、相、查、后、荆、红、游、竺、权、逯、盖、後、桓、公、万俟、司马、上官、欧阳、夏侯、诸葛、闻人、东方、赫连、皇甫、尉迟、公羊、澹台、公冶、宗政、濮阳、淳于、单于、太叔、申屠、公孙、仲孙、轩辕、令狐、钟离、宇文、长孙、慕容、鲜于、闾丘、司徒、司空、亓官、司寇、仉督、子车、颛孙、端木、巫马、公西、漆雕、乐正、壤驷、公良、拓拔、夹谷、宰父、谷粱、晋楚、闫法、汝鄢、涂钦、段干、百里、东郭、南门、呼延、归海、羊舌、微生、岳帅、缑亢、况后、有琴、梁丘、左丘、东门、西门、商牟、佘佴、伯赏、南宫、墨哈、谯笪、年爱、阳佟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the clans that exist within the language community. The distinction between family, clan, tribe, and nation is based on politics and emotion. Our purpose here is not to make political statements, but merely to list the names. There may be no distinction between family and clan, in which case ignore this domain and use the domain 'Family names'.
把语言社团内所存在的宗族名放在这个词群里。家族、宗族、部落、民族名之间的区别是基于政治和情感的。我们这里的目的不是要作出政治性的声明，而仅仅是把这些名字列出来。家族和宗族名之间可能并没有区别，这样的话可以跳过这一词群，使用‘姓’这个词群。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the proper names of the clans?
表示宗族名的专有名词有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Hatfields, McCoys, Bear Clan
（不太了解）

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the tribes that exist around the language community, including the name of your own tribe. These tribal names may or may not correspond with the names of countries.
把语言社团周围存在的部落名放在这个词群里，包括你自己部落的名字。这些部落名可能会也可能不会和国家名一致。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the proper names of the neighboring tribes?
表示临近部落的专有名词有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Saxons, Scots, Welsh, Picts, Irish, Normans, Vikings, Brits, Americans, Aussies, Kiwis, Sioux, Cherokee
（不太了解）

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the languages that are spoken in the area around the language community, including the name of your own language. These language names may or may not correspond with the names of countries. Do not try to include every language name in the world, only the neighboring and important ones. For instance you might want to include the languages that border your own and the national language. Give the form that you use. For instance the German people call their language 'Deutsch', but in English we call it 'German'.
把在语言社团周围使用的表示语言的专有名词放在这个词群里，也要包括你自己的语言。这些语言名可能会也可能不会和国家的名字相一致。不必把世界上所有的语言名都放进来，只要包含你周围的以及重要的就可以了。比如你可以加入你邻国的的语言名。给出你所使用的形式。比如德国人把他们自己的语言称作‘Deutsch’，而在中文里我们把它叫做‘德语’。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the languages spoken in the area?
在某个地区使用的语言有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: English, Gaelic, Irish, Welsh, Dutch, German, French, Spanish, Pidgin English
中文、英文、英语、法语、俄语、德语、西班牙语、日语、韩语、泰语、老挝语、缅甸语、越南语

AStr.Run: Use this domain for common nicknames--an additional name given to a person later in life, often descriptive. Also include general names used to call or refer to someone when you don't know their name
把常见的诨名（后来额外给一个人取的名字，通常是描述性的。）放在这个词群里。把用来称呼不知道名字的人的普通名也放进来。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the common nicknames?
常见的诨名有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: buddy, buster, guy, gal, bro, sis
伙计、家伙、小鬼、小家伙、小机灵鬼、调皮鬼、捣蛋鬼

Question.AUni: (2) What names are used to refer to someone when you don't know their name.
如果不知道一个人的名字，你会用什么名字来代表他？

ExampleWords.AUni: John Doe, Jane Doe, Joe Blow, GI Joe
张三、李四、王二麻子

AStr.Run: Use this domain for terms of endearment--a name used by lovers or spouses to express love or intimacy. Some languages may have special names used by close friends.
把表示爱称（情人或夫妻之间用来表达爱意的词）放在这个词群里。在有些语言里，好朋友之间可能会使用一些特别的名字。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the terms of endearment?
爱称有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: sweetheart, honey, dear
亲爱的、甜心、宝贝

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to the name of a place.
把表示地名的词放在这个词群里。

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the name of a place?
提到地名，你会怎么说？

ExampleWords.AUni: place name
地名

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the countries that exist around the language community, especially those countries where your language is spoken. Include the name of your own country. Do not list every country in the world, unless your language has developed special names or pronunciations for those countries. Include any country that you refer to in your language, especially those names whose pronunciation you have adapted to fit your language. Give the form of the name that you use, rather than the official spelling. For instance the Japanese refer to their country as 'Nihon', but in English will call it 'Japan'. So 'Japan' is an English word and should go into an English dictionary. But 'Nihon' is not an English word and should not go in the dictionary.

把存在于语言社团周围表示国家的专有名词放在这个词群里，尤其是那些使用你们语言的那些国家，也要包括你自己的国家。这些语言名可能会也可能不会和国家的名字相一致。不要把世界上所有的国家都列出来，除非你的语言对于那些国家有特殊的名称或发音。把任何一个用你的语言会提到的国家放进来，尤其是那些发音已经适合你的语言的国家。给出你所使用的国名的形式，而不需要官方正式的书写方式。比如日本人把他们自己的国家称作‘Nihon’，而在中文里我们把它叫做‘日本’。所以‘日本’是一个中文词，应当收入中文字典。而‘Nihon’不是一个中文词，所以不应当收入这本字典。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the proper names of the countries where your language is spoken?
哪些国家使用你的语言？

ExampleWords.AUni: Great Britain, United States of America, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Ireland
中国、新加坡

Question.AUni: (2) What are the proper names of the neighboring countries?
你的邻国有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Netherlands, Germany, France, Spain, Mexico
越南、老挝、缅甸、尼泊尔、朝鲜、蒙古、俄罗斯

Question.AUni: (3) What words are used to refer to a citizen of these countries?
提到这些国家的人，你会怎么说？

ExampleWords.AUni: Brit, the English, American, Canadian, Aussie, Kiwi
越南人、老挝人、缅甸人、尼泊尔人、朝鲜人、蒙古人、苏联人、俄国人

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the regions within your country or language area. Some of these may be political regions. Others may be informal terms. Give the local pronunciation, rather than some foreign spelling. You may want to limit this domain to just those areas within your language area. However if you have special names for areas outside of your language area, for example 'the Mideast', you should include them.
把表示你国家内区域的专有名词放在这个词群里。这些专有名词表示的区域有的可能是行政区，有的可能是非正式的用法。给出本地的发音，而不要其它地方的拼写。你可能希望把这个词群限制在说你语言的地区。然而，如果有你语言区之外区域的特殊名称（比如‘中东地区’），你也应当把它们列出来。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the regions in the area?
你语言区内的区域名有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Yorkshire, California, Midlands, Midwest, the South, outback
东北地区、华北地区、华南地区、西南地区、中西部地区、沿海地区、西部、香港行政区、澳门行政区、中东地区、加沙地带

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of cities, towns, and villages in the language area. Include the names of important cities outside of the language area if your language has a special name for the city or a different pronunciation for it. It might be good to use a map for this. In fact it is good to include a map of the language area in a published dictionary. If your language area is very large, there may be hundreds or thousands of cities, towns, and villages. In this case you will have to decide which should be included in the dictionary. Or you could decided to list them in a special section.

把表示你语言区当中的城市、城镇、乡村的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果在你的语言当中有特殊的名称或不同的发音来表示语言区之外的重要的城市，那么也需要把这些城市放在这个词群里。可能使用地图会更有帮助一些。实际上，在出版的字典里加入一张语言所在区的地图是非常好的做法。如果你的语言区很大，可能就会有成百上千的城市、城镇和乡村。这样的话，就要由你来决定需要把哪些收入这本字典。或者你也可以把它们放在一个特殊的部分里。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the cities in the language area?
你语言区内的城市名有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: London, Washington D.C.
北京、上海、广州…

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of districts within a city?

ExampleWords.AUni: Westminster, Chelsea

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of highways, roads, streets, and trails in the language area. If there are many such names, only include the important names (e.g. King's Highway) or commonly used names (e.g. Main Street).
把表示你语言区内高速公路、公路、街道、铁路的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果这样的名字太多，那就只包括那些重要的或常用的。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the streets in the language area?
你语言区内的街名有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: King's Highway, Highway 66, Main Street, Piccadilly Square, Oregon Trail
北京路、青年路、五一路、湖滨大道、海滨大道

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the heavenly bodies.
把表示天体的专有名词放在这个词群里。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the planets?
行星有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto
金星、木星、水星、火星、土星、地球、天王星、海王星、冥王星

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of the constellations?
星座有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Milky Way, Big Dipper, Orion, Pleiades, Southern Cross
银河、北斗七星、猎户座、狮子座、南十字星座、大熊座、小熊座 exm

Question.AUni: (3) What are the names of the stars?
星星有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: North Star, Morning Star, Betelgeuse, Alpha Centauri
北极星、启明星

Question.AUni: (4) What are the names of other heavenly bodies?
还有哪些其它的天体？

ExampleWords.AUni: Halley's Comet
哈雷彗星

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the continents. Only include the names of continents if your language has borrowed or adapted the name and you talk about them in your language.
把表示大陆的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果你的语言借用了其它语言当中的这些词或改编了它们而且你们已经在用自己的语言谈论这些大陆，那么只要把这些名字放进这个词群就可以了。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the continents?
大陆的名称有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Australia, Europe, North America, South America,
非洲、南极洲、亚洲、澳洲、欧洲、北美洲、南美洲

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the mountains in the language area. Only include the names of mountains outside the language area if your language has borrowed or adapted the name and you talk about them in your language.
把表示你语言区内山的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果你的语言借用了其它语言中的词或改编了这些词来表示语言区之外的山，并且已经在用自己的语言谈论这些山，那么再把它们放到这个词群里来。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the mountains in the language area?
在你语言区之内的山有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Mount Rainier, Mount McKinley
黄山、泰山、庐山、嵩山、华山、峨眉山、昆仑山、天山、乞力马扎罗山…

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of the mountain ranges in the language area?
在你语言区之内的山脉有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Rocky Mountains, Sierras, Appalachian Mountains
横断山脉、喜马拉雅山脉、落基山脉

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the oceans and lakes in the language area. Only include the names of oceans and lakes outside the language area if your language has borrowed or adapted the name and you talk about them in your language.
把表示你语言区之内海洋和湖泊的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果你的语言借用了其它语言中的词或改编了这些词来表示语言区之外的海洋与湖泊，并且已经在用自己的语言谈论它们，那么再把这些词放到这个词群里来。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the oceans?
海洋名有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Atlantic Ocean, Pacific Ocean, Indian Ocean, Arctic Ocean, Mediterranean Sea
大西洋、太平洋、印度洋、北冰洋、地中海、爱琴海、波罗的海、渤海、黄海、东海、南海

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of the lakes in the language area?
你语言区之内的湖有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Lake Superior, Lake Michigan
太湖、洪湖、鄱阳湖、洞庭湖、青海湖、天池、滇池、抚仙湖、泸沽湖、洱海、安大略湖、死海

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the proper names of the rivers in the language area. Only include the names of rivers outside the language area if your language has borrowed or adapted the name and you talk about them in your language.
把表示你语言区之内河流的专有名词放在这个词群里。如果你的语言借用了其它语言中的词或改编了这些词来表示语言区之外的河流，并且已经在用自己的语言谈论它们，那么再把这些词放到这个词群里来。

Question.AUni: (1) What are the names of the rivers in the language area?
你语言区之内的河流有哪些？

ExampleWords.AUni: Thames, Mississippi, Missouri, Hudson
长江、黄河、珠江、黑龙江、雅鲁藏布江、怒江、红河、独龙江、泰晤士河、塞纳河、恒河、尼罗河、密西西比河

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the name of a thing. Many cultures give names to particular buildings, ships, airplanes, organizations, companies, schools, and other things. If your language has hundreds of names for some kind of thing, it is best to not try to list them all. But if there are a few important names for one kind of thing, set up a domain for them.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to a name for something?
提到东西的名字，你会怎么说？

ExampleWords.AUni: name, proper name, designation, label, nomenclature, tag, title,
名字、名称、叫什么

Question.AUni: (2) What words are used to indicate the name of something?

ExampleWords.AUni: be called, be known as, be entitled, be termed, go by the name of, so-called,

Question.AUni: (3) What words are used to refer to something when you can't remember what it is called?

ExampleWords.AUni: what's its name, thingy, thingamajig, whatchamacallit, whatsit, such and such

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to a name that is not correct?

ExampleWords.AUni: misnomer,

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe something that has the name of something but not its qualities?

ExampleWords.AUni: nominal, in name only,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to giving something a name?

ExampleWords.AUni: call, name, rename,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to the name of an animal. Some cultures give names to domesticated animals or to animals in stories. Think through each kind of domesticated animal.
把有关动物的词放在这个词群里。在有些地方，人们会给家养的动物或故事里的动物起名字。按照每一种动物来想。

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the name of an animal?
哪些名字是给动物起的？

ExampleWords.AUni: Br'er rabbit
咪咪

Question.AUni: (2) What names are given to dogs?
哪些名字是给狗起的？

ExampleWords.AUni: Lassie, Fifi, Toto
赛虎、小黑、小灰、小花、花花、笨笨

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to the name of a building.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the name of a building?

ExampleWords.AUni: White House, Capitol

AStr.Run: A list of Role tags based on the book "Describing Morphosyntax" by Thomas E. Payne(p. 129).
The most Agent-like argument of a multi-argument clause (transitive).
The most Patient-like argument of a multi-argument clause (transitive).
The only nominal argument of a single argument clause (intransitive).
The S or A argument in a Nominative/Accusative system of grammatical relations.
Usually the P argument in a Nominative/Accusative system. The object most closely tied to the Verb syntactically.
An object less closely tied to the Verb syntactically than the Direct Object.
The A argument in an Ergative/Absolutive system of grammatical relations.
The S or P argument in an Ergative/Absolutive system of grammatical relations.
A nominal with at best secondary relation to the Verb in a Clause.
A list of basic descriptive Syntax tags.
A phrase consisting of an Adjective and its modifiers.
A phrase consisting of an Adverb and its modifiers.
A group of words with a single central Verb Phrase.
A chain of Clauses.
A phrase consisting of a Noun and its modifiers.
An Adpositional Phrase where the central constituent follows the Nominal.
An Adpositional Phrase where the central constituent precedes the Nominal.
A clause that serves as a noun modifier.
A complete grouping of one or more Clauses.
A grouping of (usually) a Verb Phrase and its inflectional modifiers.
A phrase consisting of a Verb and its direct modifiers.
A list of Semantic tags based on an email from John Roberts about RRG. This will need further work when crossing trees are possible in FLEx.
An RRG macrorole, most agentive.
An RRG macrorole, least agentive.
Non-Macrorole argument.
A list of Syntax tags based on an email from John Roberts about RRG.
Reference Phrase replaces the Noun Phrase(NP) in earlier RRG models (Van Valin 2006).
Used for arguments represented by bound morphemes.
Non-predicative verbs required for the formation of particular syntactic constructions.
The CORE of a Reference Phrase.
The NUCLEUS of a Reference Phrase.
The PERIPHERY of a Reference Phrase.
The CORE of a Modifier Phrase.
The NUCLEUS of a Modifier Phrase.
PP is either Prepositional Phrase or Postpositional Phrase depending on the typology of the language.
The CORE of an Adpositional Phrase(PP).
The NUCLEUS of an Adpositional Phrase(PP).
A variant of a lexeme, characteristically used by a specific demographic subset of the language.
If two forms are free variants, the same speaker might use either one in the same setting. The more frequent form would be considered the basic form.
An Irregularly Inflected Form is an inflected form of the lexeme that is different from what you would expect from the normal rules of the grammar.
The plural form of a noun that does not take the regular inflectional affix for plural.
The past tense form of a verb that does not take the regular inflectional affix for past tense.
A variant spelling of a lexeme.
